title: fvFormElement
description: To create form control element inside fvForm component, use this component.

prop.name: singleLine
prop.description: If you want draw label and input element in single line, set this to true.

prop.name: inline
prop.description: If your input element(s) is a non block level (eg fvCheck or fvSwitch) set this to true.

note: You can apply Framevuerk grid classes to this component and parent fvForm.

If you want to build your custom form element, inject fvFormElement var (provided by fvFormElement) and call turn(on:Boolean) on focus and blur events of your component to make it compatible with fvFormElement.
